Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12087 affecting package rsync for versions less than 3.4.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12087 affecting package rsync for versions less than 3.4.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rsync is earlier than 3.4.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-12087
